US Ambassador Bridget Brynk commented on the Russian strike of the Russian Federation along Kryvyi Rih on the evening of March 12 and stressed that it is very important to approve funding to support Ukraine right now.

She is about itwroteon your Twitter page.

“Russia again attacked Kryvyi Rih, hitting a dwelling house, injuring and killing civilians. For 748 days, Russia has been running a large -scale war against Ukraine. And Russia will continue it if you do not stop it. That is why it is critical to approve funding for Ukraine right now, ”the message reads.

Today Russia again attacked Kryvyi Rih, striking an apartment building, injuring and killing civilians. For 748 days Russia has waged a full-scale war against Ukraine. And if not stopped, Russia will continue. This is why it is critical to pass the funding for Ukraine now.pic.twitter.com/ALuP4L3s0A

— Ambassador Bridget A. Brink (@USAmbKyiv)March 12, 2024

As reported by the Armyinform, the number of victims of yesterday's rocket attack of Russians on Kryvyi Rih of Dnipropetrovsk regionincreasedUp to four, a 47-year-old woman died in the hospital.
